website_summaries.verdict: These vibrant boots are perfect for fashionistas, but be aware of the sizing discrepancies.
pros: Lipstick red color makes the boots stand out from the crowd
Look great with a variety of clothing
cons: Buy half a size up to increase comfort levels

customer_reviews.title: They are really beautiful, but...
customer_reviews.text: The boots are really really nice looking in person. They are a lux, rich, deep black, the slouch is perfect especially around the ankle given that it’s not baggy or sloppy/awkward looking at all. They feel true to size in terms of width and around the calf. But I will return them since they are pretty uncomfortable to walk in. I am comfortable walking in typically heel/pumps and heel boots but the angle the boot forces your foot into is too steep. Also, the heel is on the thinner spectrum (towards the base) and does not feel sturdy while walking. Shame!
customer_reviews.author: El Williams

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, however
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, however, I received them in a brown box, not the original Steve Madden box. I felt like they were hand me downs. Like , ok, they don't fit this customer, let's rewrap and pass on to another who is her size and hope for the best. Even the insoles were used, like some one else tried them on. They were flapping like someone else struggled to get them off as well as trying to get them on! Sorry!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Marie D'Emidio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful leather boot
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order my usual size because of the reviews warning that the boot ran small due to the absence of a zipper. Ordered my usual size and they fit perfectly! A bit high, but very comfortable and super beautiful and stylish. I ordered these boots in the white and am awaiting the arrival of the red suede. The white is a a very attractive soft white. Beautiful boots, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P

customer_reviews.title: These boots are really cute but I had to return ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are really cute but I had to return them. The leather doesn't stretch so they were impossible to get on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: The boots are gorgeous but they run about a size too small. Was so sad to have to return them. Beautiful design though!
customer_reviews.author: Zilede

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: They are absolutely Gorgeous in person!!! I believe I ordered to small. Higher heal than I thought. They are everything I thought I wanted until reality set in that I had to work all day doing Hair. You will not be disappointed. Very expensive looking!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: After I wear it fits as expected but not comfortable to walk
customer_reviews.text: I wanted those shoes for a long time. I got them but it is very difficult to wear because don't have a zip. After I wear it fits as expected but not comfortable to walk. The nose of the shoes is too up. And a color not really red, it mixes with a little bit white.
customer_reviews.author: LIA

customer_reviews.title: She has other boots that fit fine and are 1/2 size smaller than her normal shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: My fiance could not get these on in her size, and she has slim feet and ankles. These boots were too tight in the ankle area. She had to go up a size. She has other boots that fit fine and are 1/2 size smaller than her normal shoe size. Go figure. Women's shoe/boot sizes are a lottery.
customer_reviews.author: DaBrit

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Boots 4 Slim Legs!
customer_reviews.text: So although these toots are snug without socks, they still fit. If that makes sense. I don't want to go a half size up because I don't want them to be swim around my legs (skinny legs). The boots are gorgeous! I am a true size 7 and I purchased a 7.
customer_reviews.author: Lady V Style Diva

customer_reviews.title: SEXY
customer_reviews.text: So sexy, exactly what I expected. And most importantly these are not boots that you have to just sit down and look cute in.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: SIZE UP at least a half of a size.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful boots however just as others have stated they do run small I am a true 9 and these I ordered a 9 1/2 and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Angelwings

customer_reviews.title: I love them and they fit about as you would expect
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! I love them and they fit about as you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots!!!! A little snug on the calf but they are pretty
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these fall/winter boots
customer_reviews.text: True to color! I got so many compliments, Absolutely love these fall/winter boots!
customer_reviews.author: Noveea Lonon

customer_reviews.title: Boots are Clearly USED
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were advertised as new and was priced at new. Clearly these are worn. I would have never paid $140 for a pair of Steve Madden used boots. This is terribly misleading and dishonest.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: It fits great!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear 81/2 but I ordered a 9. According to the reviews the sizes runs small. It fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Beutiful boots in beautiful scarlet red color. I really wanted it to work but boots are uncomfortable and you should order size up.
customer_reviews.author: nela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They fit great and it’s not uncomfortable to walk around with.
customer_reviews.author: Iris C. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They can be worn for any occasion and are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kobie Lush

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. These shoes are made for fake feet. The ties can’t get passed the instep.
customer_reviews.author: camille

customer_reviews.title: Choose at least one Size bigger than your own
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Indeed but unfortunately too small Even if I chose a bigger size than my usual. I had to Return them
customer_reviews.author: MARIANGELA

customer_reviews.title: Go up half a size!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots! They do run small so I went up half a size from 6 to 6.5. I had the opportunity to try on a size 7 but the ran too big. Can't wait to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Nickita

customer_reviews.title: Great brand. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, have gotten so many compliments. Purchased them for a Halloween costume but ended up wearing them for my birthday. They feel high quality and comfy just like my other Steve Madden shoes. They are a little “distressed” but look great with dresses, jeans and shorts.
customer_reviews.author: BadHobbit

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous boots!
customer_reviews.text: You should go half a size up in this boot...but they are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Hause

customer_reviews.title: Idk what too say...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the white boots because white boots are hard to find. I bought a 9 which is my normal size. However, the only thing harder than finding white boots was putting these boots on. I was worried I was going to rip the material while I was pulling them on. Once I got it on it wasn’t comfortable at all and I spent several minutes getting the boot off. I gave them to my friends teenage daughter and she put them without an issue. So I guess they’re not made for the mature foot. A lower heel and a side zipper would be great additions to these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Danee

customer_reviews.title: Not as the description say
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty boots but boot opening is not 16" it's 14". Its advertised as measuring 16" that is the reason why I bought it. "Boot opening measures approximately 16" around"
customer_reviews.author: ShortyMN

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Carrie Fashion Boot
product_meta.description:
With a sharp high heel, scrunched shaft and soft suede surfaces that hint at autumn weather, our new CARRIE boot exudes chic attitude and is sure to be one of fall’s most fabulous footwear styles!

What began as a modest $1100 investment in 1990 has developed into one of the most iconic brands in footwear. From a factory in Queens, NY, Steve Madden has revolutionized the shoe industry, merging years of experience with unique and creative designs. Inspired by rock and roll and his New York roots, his vision to provide on-trend women and men with an outlet to express their individuality is innovative, daring, and inspiring. Steve’s innate understanding of trends and unparalleled willpower have resulted in millions of customers worldwide and propelled his designs to the forefront of fashion. He has expanded the Steve Madden brand into a true lifestyle and destination for footwear, handbags and accessories, sold in over 80 countries worldwide. It’s about authenticity. It’s about embracing individuality. It’s Steve Madden.
